parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Beyond here is Lord Zuuteruka's office. He's also the
commander of this garrison... Make sure to watch your words
and actions carefully.

\C[1]■Request Details: Combat Training■Requester:
Rozaro\C[0]Combat training in preparation for the Training
Corps. Looking for a sparring partner for mock battles.

\C[1]■Request Details: Combat Training■Requester:
Rozaro\C[0]Combat training in preparation for the Training
Corps. Looking for a sparring partner for mock battles.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Here, we have a request board set up by the residents and
our Ryuda soldiers.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You cannot undertake multiple requests at the same time.
Also, you cannot accept other requests until you complete
the one you've undertaken and the date changes.

\C[1]■Request Details: Other■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0] Assistance with creative works, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Miscellaneous■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0]Assistance with creative work, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? What business do you have beyond here?
\N<Segi>...I have something to ask Zuuteruka. Please let me through.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Lord Zuuteruka, may I allow her passage?
\N<Zuuteruka>Huh? I'm a bit tied up right now. What do you want?
\N<Ryuda Soldier>...The woman in question has arrived. What should we do?
\N<Zuuteruka>Hmph, Segi, huh? Fine, let her in. But make it quick.

As Segi stepped into the room, she was met with a scene she
had never anticipated.

By the entrance, a young boy was crouching and sobbing,
while on the bed, his mother was being violated by
Zuuteruka.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, didn't I tell you I was busy? It's quite rude to
barge in on people making love.

\N<Segi>Making love, you say?! Who in their right mind would see it
that way?! Release that woman immediately!

\N<Zuuteruka>Don't be ridiculous, anyone can see this is an act of love.
Right?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, you hear that? She says it's making love. This
mother and child are mine; I picked them up. No one has the
right to complain.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, so? What did you want to talk about? Surely you
didn't come just to watch this scene?

Faced with the horrific scene before her, Segi gritted her
teeth in frustration at her own powerlessness.

Then, calming her breathing slowly, she began to speak as if
she had made some kind of decision.
\N<Segi>...It's nothing grand. Just a matter of personal curiosity.

\N<Segi>Why... Why do you Ryuda soldiers keep repeating acts of
aggression...?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, I don't know what's gotten into you, but fine. I'll
answer.

\N<Zuuteruka>Officially, it's about military expansion following
religious conversion... supposedly aiming to take over some
big country eventually. But I don't really know the truth.

\N<Segi>You don't know the truth...? Then why do you follow such an
organization?

\N<Zuuteruka>That's simple. Being at the core of Ryuda gives me more
options. Options to fulfill my dreams and desires, and even
whims that come to mind one day.
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe... How about it, Segi? Do you understand?

\N<Segi>Dreams and desires... In your case, they're probably nothing
but harmful things that hurt others... I don't want to
understand.

\N<Zuuteruka>Is that so? That's too bad. You and Yuia must be quite
satisfied with your modest daily happiness, huh?
\N<Segi>Are you trying to insult me and Lord Yuia?
\N<Segi>...Let me ask you one more thing.

\N<Segi>In your repeated invasions, you must have fought various
enemies. Some of them must have had superior weapons and
equipment.

\N<Segi>For example... say there was an opponent with very tough
armor or shields. What did you do then?

\N<Segi>It's about interest... I told you, it's a matter of my
personal interest.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, is that so? The arduous effort to win through the
training sessions, huh?

\N<Zuuteruka>Dealing with tough armor and shields... Oh yeah, there was
some technique or other in Ryuda's training methods, I
heard. But as you can see, I'm a newcomer, so I don't know
the details.

\N<Zuuteruka>Is that all you wanted to talk about? Hehehe, then how about
it? Why don't you join us?
\N<Segi>Don't make fun of me! And stop this nonsense at once...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Oh, is that so. But if you ever want this guy, just let me
know, okay? Hehehe...
\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I overheard your conversation just now.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The technique Lord Zuuteruka was talking about... I could
teach it to you, as a special case.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>But not here. I have my own position to consider. Let's
see... come to the barracks after some time has passed.

\N<Segi>...What do you want in return? What do you gain by leaking
Ryuda's techniques to me?

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Heh, naturally, I won't tell you for free. You'll have to
prepare something of equal value in exchange.
